author: elecharny
msg: Removed the warnig produced when we were adding the EntryDN attribute : if it's already there, we don't try to add it again (the EntryDN attribute is present because we are fetching the entry from an AvlPartition, which is in memory, and contins entry that are not immutable, thus contains the EntryDN once they have been read once)

author: mukulg
msg: adding a folder xs-1.1-tests for copying a unit test suite, related to XML Schema 1.1 functionality.

author: szetszwo
msg: svn merge -c 1422482 from branch-1 for HDFS-3942. Backport HDFS-3495 and HDFS-4234: Update Balancer to support new NetworkTopology with NodeGroup and use generic code for choosing datanode in Balancer.
